message: So I am going to be in SF for the first time in years. I know have an iPhone 4. After listening to TWIT and BOL for years I'm not sure how bad it will be. Will it be as bad I hear?
No it's not so bad now. ATT upgraded their networks.
It's pretty damn bad in my experience, at least in the Mission and Lower Haight. Tons of places where I don't get any signal, or I do get signal but can't actually load anything or make calls.
I have an iPhone 4 with ATT service, and my experience is as follows: completely unusable in Hayes Valley / Lower Haight... very spotty in the Mission... no problems in the Financial District
Yeah, it does suck in a lot of areas, sometimes I force my phone to 'edge' ... it help ... sometimes.
It's amazing in both Nob and Russian Hill.
